1370110.name: Sarab 2: Thalj Mountains
1370110.description:
Sarab 2: Thalj Mountains is the second sequence to Sarab series. It is a traditional JRPG-styled game which focuses on story-telling, exploration and turn-based battling. Each main character has its own mysterious story. Furthermore, the game has a unique atmosphere which absolutely makes it a different experience in comparison to other JRPG games.



After Sarab and his friends defeated one of the Five Devils and obtained the Fire Crystal, he found himself with a new adventure and a very mysterious task about missing two hearts. During their journey, Sanad and Zara suddenly disappeared due to magical powers which teleported them to a place called Thalj Mountains. In the other hand, the Five Devils’ boss, Goblet of Death, sensed the movement of an old enemy and felt the need to trace him immediately.

What is the story of the two hearts? What will Sarab do without Sanad and Zara? And who is his next enemy? Will they reunite again?
You will experience all of it in this in a profoundly emotional and unforgettable story in the second sequence of Sarab series.



- A mid-length RPG that focuses on storytelling
- No side quests
- No random encounters!
- Character Art
- Detailed graphics
- Area Map System
